Dataset Conversion

ProtDCal convert PDB files into FASTA files, using the "Dataset Format Conversion" button, located in the menu Option. This option transforms many PDB files into one multi-sequences FASTA file or in multiple single FASTA files using the output panel. In addition the residue length for each line can be configured using the "Residue line length" option. First one needs to load the PDB files and select the output file directory, and then click "Convert" button to begin the process.

Convert PDB->FASTA

ProtDCal also allows merging many FASTA files into one Multi-sequences file, first tone needs to load the FASTA files and select the output file, and then click "Convert" button to begin the process.

Create MultiFasta file

ProtDCal Protein Descriptor Calculation
